channel.title: Can't even move in my server, HELP!
channel.description:
One day, everything was fine, but when I ran my server and I logged on, my character kept doing this (it's supposed to be an animation): [IMG]http://i156.photobucket.com/albums/t32/Flamingice07/psproblem-1.gif[/img]
I could change menus and do other stuff fine, but when I tried to walk, it just froze. It was like this for any account. I have no idea what happened, and I checked everything, but it seems to be OK.
Since I have no idea what happened, I'll just post up my client.java & player.java here. It would also really help if you told me what the problem was. I know it's a bit hard to do, but I would really appreciate it if someone helped, so I could actually run my server again.
Thanks, LandScape
Download my client.java at: [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?azzn2yz5nrn]http://www.mediafire.com/?azzn2yz5nrn[/URL] Download my player.java at: [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?aaljijemozz]http://www.mediafire.com/?aaljijemozz[/URL]

item.title: Can't even move in my server, HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Heavenly_Pk Heavenly Pk
item.description:
@Heavenly_Pk wrote:

uhm if you have a backup before this glitch i suggest you just use that
